meanings.sent1: The movie had the corniest jokes that everyone had heard before.
meanings.sent2: That joke is the corniest one in the book.
meanings.sent3: The play was so corny that even the actors couldn't keep a straight face.
meanings.sent4: Her excuses for being late were the corniest stories I've ever heard.
meanings.sent5: The corniest part of the show was when the characters broke into a spontaneous song.

meanings.sent1: The love letter he wrote was the corniest thing she had ever read.
meanings.sent2: The movie's ending was the corniest scene, with tears and dramatic music.
meanings.sent3: She couldn't help but laugh at the corniest soap opera on TV.
meanings.sent4: The proposal at the restaurant was the corniest display of affection.
meanings.sent5: The corniest part of the play was when the characters professed their undying love.
